trans-unit.source: Specifies the painting style applied to one <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> contained in a form.
You cannot explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to Custom.

However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> returns Custom when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Renderer%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to an extension of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class that is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>.

Indicates that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode"></xref> is not determined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager"></xref> or the use of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref> other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer"></xref>
Indicates that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer"></xref> determines the painting style.
Indicates the use of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer"></xref> to paint.
Indicates the use of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer"></xref> to paint.
